name: DYLAN Newborn Winter Bonnet
description:
Ready to Ship
OOAK Newborn Winter Bonnet

This color way is so calm and soothing ...one color blending into the other. It's also a nice warm soft yarn that will be so nice next to baby's skin. The stitch is dense enough to keep the cold out. Perfect for cool weather and a pretty bonnet for photos :)

name: DENVER Crochet Newborn Winter Baby Hat
description:
Ready to Ship
OOAK Newborn Winter Bonnet

Beautiful and Vibrant ... the colors in this bonnet are so beautiful and earthy. This yarn is a soft to the touch lightweight alpaca that will be so nice against baby's skin. The ties are the same yarn and are very long. You can't beat the colors and the great rustic stitch of this bonnet. Perfect for cool weather and a pretty bonnet for photos :)

name: BOSTON Newborn Baby Hat
description:
Ready to Ship
OOAK Newborn Winter Bonnet

Great deep rich colors in a vibrant stripping. Earthy tones of chocolate, mocha, a tan tweed, taupe and a rich pumpkin. The hat ties with thick long strands of jute for a more rustic feel. The yarn is very soft and flexible. Perfect for cool weather and a pretty bonnet for photos :)

name: ELLIE Crochet Newborn Winter Bonnet
description:
Ready to Ship
OOAK Newborn Winter Bonnet

This bonnet is so pretty and subtle. The yarn is a lightweight wool, so warm and soft to the touch. The color is a perfect winter sky blue. The stitch is dense yet the bonnet is flexible with a pretty flare around the face. The subtle accent mocha and blue flower adds the perfect vintage chic finishing touch. Perfect for cool weather and a pretty bonnet for photos :)

name: CAMILLE Newborn Winter Bonnet
description:
Ready to Ship
OOAK Newborn Winter Bonnet

This bonnet is so pretty and subtle. The yarn is lightweight yes feels so warm and soft to the touch. The colors are beautiful is an ombrey of ivory to blush. The stitch is dense yet the bonnet is flexible. The subtle accent flower and lace adds the perfect vintage chic finishing touch. Perfect for cool weather and a pretty bonnet for photos :)

name: BIG BUTTON Crochet Newborn Holiday Beanie
description:
Ready to Ship
OOAK Newborn Christmas Beanie

Love this two tones green beanie made cheery Christmas green cotton and darker green tweed yarn. The this huge rustic looking red button is tied on for a really fun hat for the holidays. Wear on outings or for photos and fun holiday functions. Perfect Christmas colors for a boy or a girl.

name: REINDEER MOSS  Crochet Newborn Bonnet
description:
Ready to Ship
OOAK Newborn Christmas Beanie

A cheery holiday green in a versatile easy care cotton yarn. The pattern is a crosstitch pattern and the yarn has wonderful imperfections in the form of a great thick thin textured spin making this hat a great photography hat for moms or photographers but perfect to wear on cool winter and Christmas and Holiday outings.

name: ROBINS EGG Crochet Newborn Bonnet
description:
Ready to Ship
OOAK Newborn Christmas Beanie

Subtle robins egg blue wool yarn makes a warm and cozy winter baby hat. The stitch is a geometric design and will work for a boy or a girl. Perfect for photos and great fool cool weather outings. Stretchy soft and warm. The stitch is dense yet the bonnet is flexible.

name: WEAVER Newborn Crochet Bonnet
description:
Ready to Ship
OOAK Newborn Christmas Beanie

This yarn is out of my secret stash and oh so fun in a bright blue with little tuffs of pink yellow and green. The bonnet is crocheted but has a great weave look to if that is dense yet flexible and will be a warm bonnet for winter outings. Perfect as a fun photo prop also

description:

A nice versatile and pretty hat.
